course_id: The numeric ID of the course in the LMS. It can be omitted if a valid 'course_code' parameter is provided
username: The LMS username of the user. It can be specified instead of 'user_id' parameter
user_id: The ID of the user. It can be omitted if a valid 'username' parameter is provided
level: (optional) Enrollment level, 'student' and 'learner' are identical. For new ILT courses, instructors cannot be enrolled. Can be student, tutor, instructor, coach or learner
status: (optional) This field is required if NOT set inside the 'options' object. Can be subscribed, in_progress, completed, waiting, to_confirm or suspended
completion_date: (optional) Date of last complete (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS e.g '2015-06-30 12:00:00')
active_from: (optional) Start date of the enrollment in UTC (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS e.g '2019-06-30 12:00:00')
active_until: (optional) Expiry date of the enrollment in UTC (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS e.g '2015-06-30 12:00:00')
passed: (optional) Indicates if the user passed or not (true or false)
present: (optional) Indicates if the user was present at the session. If set to true, the user attendance is set to 'Present' for all the events of the session. It is ignored otherwise.
timezone: (optional) Time zone: UTC, Europe/Sofia, etc. It applies only to enrollment_date and completion_date fields. Default: 'UTC'
field_xxx: (optional) Multiple additional fields may be added. Simply replace 'xxx' with the right field ID (do not use the 'human' additional field name
batch_item_id: (optional) Client-specified ID for the current batch item. IT will be returned in the output as it is
assignment_type: (optional) Assignment Type enrollment attribute. Can be passed only when the attribute is configured in the platform advanced settings. The possible values are 'mandatory', 'required', 'recommended', 'optional' but to be accepted they must be enabled in the settings. This parameter is optional.
